The Advanced sub-county model has five key features. 1) Silos with a warehouse receipting system for a pro farmer market px stabilisation.
2) each sub-county shall have a minimum of ten acres of farmer school demonstration (DFIs) manned by 2 agric extension offficers
3) Universal health insurance scheme whose payments you can link to crop earnings to guarantee quality healthcare for all.
4) Sports and recreation hall for talent identification, grooming and promotion for global competitiveness.
5) an ICT hub that among others allows for farmers to connect with other farmers, registration of businesses, etc
